original_text: He is to share equally in their benefits, even though he has received money from the sale of family possessions.
korean_text: 그 사람의 몫은 그들과 같을 것이요 그가 조상의 것을 판 것은 별도의 소유이니라

sentences.original_text: He is to share equally in their benefits
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 혜택을 공평하게 나누어 가져야 한다

sentences.original_text: even though he has received money
from the sale of family possessions
